abstract: A Dot Earth reader offers a path toward progress starting with one's own street.
snippet: A Dot Earth reader offers a path toward progress starting with one's own street.
lead_paragraph: The Comment of the Day goes to Kip Hansen, from St. Thomas in the U.S. Virgin Islands (someone whose views are often very different than mine). Here he reacts to my call to young people to engage, whatever their passions and predispositions might be:
